name: Cleanup Royale
description:
Cleanup Royale

An October Buddy Up Jam 2021 submission, by Team Cowberry!

Game Overview

If you've ever wondered who keeps cleaning up all the battle royale maps, you're about to find out.

Cleanup Royale is a Top-down 2D cleanup game, where you clean up after a battle royale match has just ended. You repair broken doors, put weapons and items back in their intended spots, as well as clean up blood splatters. All this has to be done within a specific time limit. If you complete all your tasks you win the game, and the map is ready to be messed up all over again!
